title.narrative: 1.4. JUSTICE FOR CHILDREN

description.narrative: Children's access to justice is ensured through specialized justice system, which contributes to Access To Justice, Justice For Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children, especially the most deprived, access and utilize quality and equitable protection, education, health and nutrition services

participating-org.narrative: THE INSTITUTE OF EDUCATION OF THE REPUBLIC OF AZERBAIJAN

sector.narrative: Access to child-friendly police and justice sector services
Alternative care reform and service provision
Justice sector workforce strengthening and capacity building (including police)
Promoting diversion and alternatives to deprivation of liberty

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Children?s access to justice is ensured through specialized justice system

description.narrative: Guidelines on child-friendly legal aid were approved by the Azerbaijan Bar Association and recommended for use by lawyers. Guidelines on child -friendly communication and procedures was approved by the Ministry of Internal Affairs for use in investigative processes in police departments. One child-friendly room was established at the Court for Grave Crimes in Lankaran district. Legal aid services were maintained within the social services programmes. | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/01/2021

title.narrative: of specialized juvenile justice teams consisting of judges, prosecutors, and lawyers are functional across the country(46514)
Existence of procedures and services for children in contact with law that are applied and delivered in line with international norms
